title: 88/310/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 May 1988 concerning health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the State of Goias, Brazil
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 May 1988
concerning health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the State of Goias, Brazil
(88/310/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The authorization to import fresh meat from Brazil laid down in Decision 86/195/EEC is suspended in respect of fresh meat of bovine animals slaughtered after 15 May 1988 in the State of Goias.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 May 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
